    • displayCardsKIM

      public void displayCardsKIM()
      Displays cards in hand by loading their corresponding images into card slots.

      Retrieves card names from gameDataBridge, loads their images with loadCardImage, and assigns them to the appropriate cardSlots.

      Löst aus:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if more cards exist than slots.
